Workflow.Name: SetupWizard>UpdateInventoryTypeAppSetting
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard, and configures what navigation options to show in the Power Platform Admin view app based on your inventory data source.
Workflow.BillingContext: [{"id":"admin_CoESetupWizardPreview","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"CoE Setup and Upgrade Wizard"}},{"id":"admin_SetupWIzardARMFeatures","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"Setup WIzard - ARM Features"}}]

Description.description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard, and configures what navigation options to show in the Power Platform Admin view app based on your inventory data source.
